external_references.description: Microsoft. (2022, August 26). Protecting Microsoft 365 from on-premises attacks. Retrieved February 21, 2023.

description: Limit the number of high-privileged domain and cloud accounts, and ensure that these are not used for day-to-day operations. Ensure that on-premises accounts do not have privileged cloud permissions and that isolated, cloud-only accounts are used for managing cloud environments.(Citation: Protecting Microsoft 365 From On-Premises Attacks)
